Key Match Events: In a major road win, the Houston Rockets defeated the Memphis Grizzlies last night, 119-115.
Houston Rockets guard Fred VanVleet dribbled as Memphis Grizzlies guard Luke Kennard defended during the fourth quarter at FedExForum.
Post-Match Reflections: The win proved that Houston could be a legitimate title contender in the NBA with an impressive resume thus far.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Houston and Memphis are in a tight race for the No. 2 seed in the Western Conference, as the Grizzlies are 24-14.
The Rockets lead the season series over the Grizzlies 2-0.
